text: "Come Back and Stay" is a 1983 song by Paul Young and taken from his debut studio album No Parlez. It topped the single charts in Belgium, Germany, New Zealand and Switzerland and also went to number 2 in the Netherlands, number 3 in Austria, Ireland and Norway, number 4 in the United Kingdom, number 5 in France and number 16 in Sweden. == References == Category:1983 songs Category:Paul Young songs Category:Blue-eyed soul songs
title: Come Back and Stay
